game.name: Succubus Farm
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A dungeon escape, action game. Play as a captured human forced to work for demons, but one day you decide to make a mad dash for freedom!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A dungeon escape, action game. Play as a captured human forced to work for demons, but one day you decide to make a mad dash for freedom!
